column3: Traffic;( Prey Veng):------  A tragic accident was caused when a truck (reported as having RCAF plates in several sources) collided with a car at 10:45 pm on the 28th of January 2019.------ Four men and two women were killed in the crash on National Road 1 between km 91-92 in Cholong Village
column7: the car was driven by an official with the district traffic police. ------The truck driver escaped from the scene. Police are now investigating.------Warning
